question:
7. What are messages of the song? Choose two best answers.    A. We can live without having best friend.
B. We must be happy spending time with best friend.
C. We can make our world better because of best friends are part of it.
D. We must be grateful for having best friend besides us.​

related_questions.question:
To: Zayn    Be ready for the next
competition
I put my book in your locker.
It may be very useful for you.
Do your best.
Practice makes perfect.
I wish you all the best
Keika​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Untuk: Zayn Bersiaplah untuk kompetisi berikutnya Saya menaruh buku saya di loker Anda. Ini mungkin sangat berguna untuk Anda. Lakukan yang terbaik. Latihan membuat sempurna. Aku doakan yang terbaik untukmu Keika

itu artinya

related_questions.question:
1. He opens the door    2.We set the tbale 
3.The pays a lot of money
4.I draw a picture
5.They wear blue shoes
6.They don't help you
7.He doesn't open the book
8.You do not write the letter

ubah ke exercise on passive voice
bantu jawab ya​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. The door is opened by him.

2. The table is set by us.

3. A lot of money is paid by them.

4. A picture is drawn by me.

5. Blue shoes are worn by them.

6. You are not helped by them.

7. The book is not opened by him.

8. The letter is not written by you.

Semoga membantu ^_^

1. The door is opened by him
2. The table is set by us
3. A lot of money is paid by them
4. A picture is drawn by me
5. Blue shoes is worn by them
6. You aren’t helped by them
7. The book is not opened by him
8. The letter is not written by you

related_questions.question:
4. Salah satu janji Yesus kepada para Rasul-Nya yang la utus untuk mewartakan Injil atau kabar    baik kepada semua bangsa, adalah
A. akan diberikan umur yang panjang
B. akan diberikan keturunan yang banyak
C. akan menyertai mereka senantiasa sampai akahir zaman
D. akan diberikan harta dan kekayaan.​

answers.answer:
Jawabannya C.

Semoga membantu dan semoga benar

Jawaban:

C.akan menyertai mereka senantiasa sampai akhir zaman .

related_questions.question: Membuat kalimat positif present perfect dengan kata kerja forget​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I have forgotten learn English for one week.

Penjelasan:

forgotten adalah irreguler verb dari forget.

Present perfect tense

didefinisikan sebagai suatu bentuk kata kerja yang digunakan untuk menyatakan suatu aksi atau situasi yang telah dimulai di masa lalu dan masih berlanjut sampai sekarang atau telah selesai pada suatu titik waktu tertentu di masa lalu namun efeknya masih berlanjut.

Rumus Present Perfect Tense :

Subject + has/have + verb 3

Jawaban:

What trait

Penjelasan:

Maaf kalo salah yaa

moga bermanfaat yaa
